text:
[Verse]
Walking through the neon glow
Streets alive and city flows
Electric dreams and whispers low
Where the urban magic grows

[Verse 2]
Echoes in the alleyways
Dancing shadows interplay
Every night a new display
In this bright and endless maze

[Chorus]
City lights shining bright
Illuminate the darkest night
Every turn a different sight
In the city
Life's so right

[Bridge]
Lost in the rhythm
Pulse and beat
Every corner
New faces meet
Colors clash
Sounds so sweet
City heartbeat at our feet

[Verse 3]
Skyscrapers reach for the stars
Taxis honk like loud guitars
Life in motion
No one jars
Living large or behind bars

[Chorus]
City lights shining bright
Illuminate the darkest night
Every turn a different sight
In the city
Life's so right
title: City Lights
